name: Polite
description: Clogged mind Made a statement with this piece. Instead of using pockets as pockets he uses gun holsters to tell the world the need for violence and hate crime reduction. These gun holsters have no practical use on these pants because a real gun is way too heavy. But thatâ€™s why he wanted to implement it in the pants. Topped by a grey hoodie that has been slit, showing weak spots by showing skin in the clothing itself.
